key_risks: Environmental concerns over water usage and chemical runoff
Labor disputes and legal issues, including race discrimination and unpaid overtime
Customer dissatisfaction and potential reputational damage
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on discretionary consumer spending
controversies: Multiple lawsuits, including a $225,000 settlement in an EEOC race discrimination case
Poor customer reviews and recurring complaints about service quality and billing issues
environmental_issues: Water usage and chemical runoff, despite water recycling efforts
social_issues: Allegations of race discrimination and unpaid overtime wages
governance_issues: Legal compliance risks related to labor practices

sources.title: Water Stewardship - Mister Car Wash
sources.snippet: At Mister. We're not just a car wash: we're a team of over 6,000 strong that live, work, and go to school in the cities where we operate. sources.snippet: It's about how we wash them. Being good stewards of the environment is a priority at Mister Car Wash.
